name: Website Kickoff by Human Deluxe
description:
A good web project starts with a proper briefing. You know what makes a briefing easier: This template! In a quick kickoff session, you can collect all information necessary: Audience, goals, limitations and even the basic information architecture.


At Human Deluxe, we start a web project with a quick workshop like that, taking around one or two hours. You can find this template and more information on https://toolbox.humandeluxe.com.


Human Deluxe is an international Design Studio based in Berlin, Germany. Founded in 2019, we regularly work with big clients like SAP and Zynga, but also startups and non-profits.
